definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: To conduct other relevant businesses which may be authorized by the Central Competent Authority.
sentences.chinese: 二二經中央主管機關覈准辦理之其他有關業務。

sentences.english: The central competent authority shall determine all analysis methods in this Act.
sentences.chinese: 本法各項檢驗測定方法，由中央主管機關定之。

sentences.english: The amount of such exclusive business operation funds shall be as approved by the Competent Authority.
sentences.chinese: 其指撥營運資金之數額，應經主管機關覈准。

sentences.english: Registration certificate/license granted by competent authority, or documents for approval of incorporation or registration.
sentences.chinese: 主管機關登記證照或覈准成立或備案之文件。

sentences.english: Capital contributed by business owners and registered with the competent authority in charge.
sentences.chinese: 業主對商業投入之資本，並向主管機關登記者。

sentences.english: Other assistance affairs designated by the central competent authority.
sentences.chinese: 六其他經中央主管機關指定之輔導事項。

sentences.english: Ship's statutory certification is the responsibility of the flag state administration.
sentences.chinese: 船舶法定證書發證是船旗國主管機關的職責。

sentences.english: The competent organ shall, without delay, inform the People's Procuratorate of how it has handled the case.
sentences.chinese: 有關主管機關應當將處理結果及時通知人民檢察院。

sentences.english: All other machinery or tools designated by the competent authority of the central government.
sentences.chinese: 六其他經中央主管機關指定之機械或器具。

sentences.english: Article 37 Enforcement Rules for this Act shall be drawn by the central competent authority.
sentences.chinese: 第37條本法施行細則，由中央主管機關定之。

sentences.english: Regulators earlier expressed concern that the bid had Chinese funding.
sentences.chinese: 稍早主管機關對投標資金來自中國表示關切。

sentences.english: The central competent authority in consultation with the relevant agencies shall determine the emissions standards in the foregoing paragraph.
sentences.chinese: 前項排放標準，由中央主管機關會商有關機關定之。

sentences.english: Please keep relevant information for future reference in case of need.
sentences.chinese: 請妥善保存相關資料，以供本院應主管機關要求備查。

sentences.english: However, in case of reports in written form that are additionally prescribed by the RACGL, the enterprise shall not be constrained with this paragraph.
sentences.chinese: 但中央主管機關另有規定以書面申報者，不在此限。

definition: to set/to designate/to stipulate/to provide/to draw up/to formulate (rules etc)/stipulation
to bear joint responsibility for sth/joint liability (law)
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
